summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BitMEX analytics platform focusing on guest login, analytics tabs, and backtest functionality. All core features working well with 95.8% backend success rate and full frontend functionality confirmed.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 404 error from BitMEX API - 'Not Found' HTTPError
minor_issues.impact: Open Interest data not available, but UI handles gracefully

design_issues.issue: BitMEX error message occasionally appears but doesn't break functionality

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate)
Guest login endpoint functionality
All BitMEX symbols endpoint (118 symbols)
Analytics snapshot endpoint with depth and heat proxy
Analytics flow endpoint with CVD and buy/sell data
BitMEX candles endpoint
BitMEX orderbook depth endpoint
BitMEX flow timeseries endpoint
BitMEX funding endpoint
BitMEX liquidations endpoint
Backtest run endpoint
Guest login button works and navigates to /app/analytics
Analytics page loads with all components (Market, Flow, Composite cards)
Order book tab renders depth chart and heatmap without errors
Flow tab renders CVD+price overlay and buy/sell bars
Funding+OI+Liquidations tab loads charts (funding and liquidations work)
Price tab renders price chart correctly
Symbol switching functionality (118 symbols available)
Navigation between Analytics and Backtest pages
Backtest page configuration interface loads correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate BitMEX open-interest endpoint 404 error - may need to check BitMEX API documentation or use alternative endpoint
